#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;

    cin >> t;

    while(t--) {
        int n;
        cin >> n;
        int dig;
        dig = 0;
        int r = n;
        while(r != 0) {
            dig++;
            r = r/10;
        }
        int val = 9*dig;
        int i;
        for(i = 27; i > 0; i--) {
            int num = 0;
            r = n - i;
            while(r != 0) {
                num += (r%10);
                r /= 10;
            }
            if(num == i) {
                cout << n-i << endl;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(i == 0) {
            cout << "NONE\n";
        }
    }
}
